name: Pants Unique Druid 001
description: Your Wolf Companions are infused with the power of the storm, dealing Lightning damage and gaining the Storm Howl ability.

name: You are permanently Cold Imbued.
description: You are permanently Cold Imbued.

name: Ring Unique Druid 003
description: Every 30 seconds you spend in an animal form, your next Core Skill is guaranteed to Overpower and Critically Strike, and deals [30 - 60]%%[x] increased damage.Casting a Shapeshifting Skill reduces this timer by 1 second, or 2 seconds if it changes you to a new animal form.

name: Boots Unique Barb 100
description: When activating or refreshing the full Walking Arsenal Key Passive effect, you automatically cast Ground Stomp and gain [50 - 100] Fury. Can only occur once every 5 seconds.

name: Chest Unique Generic 100
description: Thorns has a 10%% chance to deal [100 - 200]%%[x] increased damage.

name: 1HMace Unique Druid 001
description: Defensive Skills deal [300 - 600] damage to Nearby Poisoned enemies, increased by 50%%[x] for every 100 Willpower you have.Current Bonus: 0%%[x]

name: Pants Unique Generic 101
description: When you take damage from a Non-Physical damage type, you gain [20.0 - 40.0]%%[+] Resistance to that damage type for 6 seconds. This effect can only apply to one damage type at a time.

name: Ring Unique Generic 102
description: Lucky Hit: Your damage over time effects have up to a 75%% chance to erupt, dealing [1,350 - 1,950] damage of the same type to surrounding enemies.

name: Ring Unique Sorc 100
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 30%% chance to form an exploding Ice Spike, dealing [150 - 195] Cold damage. Triple this chance if the enemy is Frozen.

name: Ring Unique Sorc 101
description: Casting a Pyromancy, Shock, or Frost Skill increases your damage by [10.0 - 20.0]%%[x] for 8 seconds, stacking once per Element. Casting again refreshes all bonuses if the previous skill was a different Element.

name: Ring Unique Barb 101
description: Rend's duration is increased by [4.0 - 8.0] seconds. Damaging enemies with your Brawling Skills applies 2 stacks of Rend's Bleed. This can only affect each enemy once every 1 second.

name: Gloves Unique Druid 100
description: Lightning Storm gains 1 additional strike each times it grows.Lightning Storm Critical Strikes cause lightning to strike twice, dealing [60 - 100]%%[x] increased damage.

name: of the Shadow Realm
description: Casting Smoke Grenade increases your Critical Strike Damage by 45%%[x] for [3 - 6] seconds and leaves behind a cloud of shadows. While within the cloud, you gain Stealth once per second.

name: Amulet Unique Sorc 101
description: Frozen Orbs deal [4.0 - 8.0]%%[x] more damage per active Summon and have a 65%% chance to create a random Conjuration when Cast.Lucky Hit: Your Summons have up to a 90%% chance to launch a Frozen Orb at a Nearby enemy.

name: Boots Unique Druid 100
description: Shapeshifting into a new animal form increases the value of your Bestial Rampage bonuses by [2.0 - 5.0]%%[+], up to [20.0 - 50.0]%%[+]. This bonus decays by 0.5%% per second.

name: Ring Unique Druid 101
description: Casts of Landslide leave behind Tectonic Spikes that deal [225 - 450] Physical damage over 2 seconds.Spawning a Landslide pillar within Tectonic Spikes has a [20 - 30]%% chance to spawn two instead.

name: Ring Unique Rogue 101
description: Rapid Fire now lobs exploding arrows that deal [50 - 70]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Ring Unique Rogue 102
description: Casting a Core Skill has a [15 - 45]%% chance to throw Stun Grenades that deal [300 - 450] Physical damage and Stun enemies for 1 second.Your Stun Grenades gain 5%% Lucky Hit Chance.

name: Earthscream
description: Petrify now deals [450 - 1,350] Physical damage. Earth Skills Petrify Healthy enemies for 3 seconds.

name: Chest Unique Rogue 101
description: Casting Dark Shroud makes you Immune for 2 seconds, but your Evade Cooldown is increased by [3.0 - 9.0] seconds.Evading while Dark Shroud is active leaves behind an explosion that deals [450 - 1,350] Shadow damage and Pulls In enemies.

name: Template Unique Spiritborn 000 x1
description: (PH) Skill has [10 - 15]%%[+] random rolled Stat against enemies with 4 static Stat and Keyword.

name: Ring Unique Druid 102
description: While Cataclysm is active, you gain unlimited Spirit and deal [20 - 40]%%[x] increased damage.Cataclysm receives your Lightning Bolt benefits.

name: Pants Unique Necro 102
description: Bone Spear deals [20 - 40]%%[x] additional damage and is a Blood Skill. Casting Bone Spear will launch another Bone Spear if it can consume a Corpse and drain 5%% of your Maximum Life.

name: Boots Unique Rogue 101
description: Mobility Skills are always Shadow Imbued with [60 - 120]%%[x] increased potency. Lucky Hit: Damaging an Elite or Boss with a Mobility Skill has up to a [40 - 80]%% chance to instantly triggers a free Shadow Imbuement explosion.

name: Gloves Unique Barb 101
description: Every 6 seconds, your next Mighty Throw detonates its pulses instantly as Fire Damage and deals [200.0 - 300.0]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Amulet Unique Spiritborn 100
description: Picking up a Storm Feather forms a firestorm around you for 8 seconds dealing [300 - 600] Fire damage every 0.5 seconds.Every 5 additional Storm Feathers you pick up intensifies the firestorm, increasing its damage by 100%%[x] but not refreshing its duration. Storm Feathers are now Jaguar Skills and the firestorm is an Eagle, Jaguar, and Storm Feather Skill.

name: Season 8 Sorcerer Helm
description: Casted Ice Shards now spreads out with 2 additional shards. You deal [1.0 - 2.0]%%[x] increased damage for each time Ice Shards damages an enemy for 5 seconds, up to [50.0 - 100.0]%%[x].

name: Gloves Unique Necro 102
description: Sacrificing both Skeletal Warriors and Golems grants an additional Skeletal Mage for each Minion sacrificed.When a Skeletal Mage attacks enemies 25 times without dying it upgrades to a Skeletal Arch-Mage.Skeletal Arch-Mages teleport to safety when attacked and their attacks occasionally shatter on impact dealing [50 - 100]%%[x] increased damage to the target and up to 3 additional targets.

name: Boots Unique Barb 101
description: Casting a Basic Skill while at Maximum Fury causes your Fury to increasingly Drain until you run out, during which your Basic skills now cleave dealing [70 - 100]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Rotting Lightbringer
description: If no puddle is around you, Pulverize forms a puddle that guarantees its own Overpowers and deals [200 - 600]%%[x] of its normal damage as Poisoning over 7 seconds. Pulverizing causes all close puddles to splash [20 - 60]%%[x] of their total damage within their areas and around them.

name: S10 Ring Unique Druid 100
description: Casting an Ultimate Skill Pulls in Distant enemies, dealing 1,398 Physical damage to them and increasing by 12%%[x] for every 1 point of Willpower you have. This effect repeats once more 5 seconds later.Current Bonus: 0%%[x]

name: S10 Ring Unique Druid 101
description: Casts of Landslide leave behind Tectonic Spikes that deal 540 Physical damage over 2 seconds.Spawning a Landslide pillar within Tectonic Spikes has a 36%% chance to spawn two instead.

name: S10 Ring Unique Spiritborn 004 x1
description: While you have at least 4 stacks of Ferocity, you gain 8.4 Vigor per second.Gaining Ferocity also grants Resolve.

name: S10 Ring Unique Spiritborn 005 x1
description: Your Maximum Vigor is increased by 50%%, and killing an enemy grants you 8.4 Vigor. While you have Ferocity, your Poisoning effects deal their damage across 33%% of the normal duration.

name: S10 Ring Unique Generic 102
description: Lucky Hit: Your damage over time effects have up to a 75%% chance to erupt, dealing 2,340 damage of the same type to surrounding enemies.

name: S10 Chest Unique Sorc 002
description: After using Teleport, Close enemies are Pulled to you and Stunned for 3.6 seconds, but Teleport's Cooldown is increased by 20%%[x].

description: Charged Bolts attempts to seek enemies, lasts longer, and deals 96.0%% increased damage for every second the bolt is alive.

name: of the Shadow Realm
description: Casting Smoke Grenade increases your Critical Strike Damage by 45%%[x] for 7.2 seconds and leaves behind a cloud of shadows. While within the cloud, you gain Stealth once per second.

description: Casting Dark Shroud makes you Immune for 2 seconds, but your Evade Cooldown is increased by 2.4 seconds.Evading while Dark Shroud is active leaves behind an explosion that deals 1,620 Shadow damage and Pulls In enemies.

description: You can now overexert yourself while Casting Flurry, spending 8%% life when you don't have enough Energy. Spending life to Cast Flurry increases its damage by 120.0%%[x] and your Attack Speed by 50%% for 5 seconds.

description: Sacrificing both Skeletal Warriors and Golems grants an additional Skeletal Mage for each Minion sacrificed.When a Skeletal Mage attacks enemies 25 times without dying it upgrades to a Skeletal Arch-Mage.Skeletal Arch-Mages teleport to safety when attacked and their attacks occasionally shatter on impact dealing 120%%[x] increased damage to the target and up to 3 additional targets.

description: Your Subterfuge Skills create an attackable Shade Totem for [3.0 - 8.0] seconds. Any base damage it takes is replicated onto surrounding enemies at 20%% effectiveness. This effect is treated as a Trap Skill. You may only have 1 Shade Totem active at a time.

description: A Pestilent Swarm spawns from you every 4 seconds, dealing [53 - 98] Poison damage per hit. Your Pestilent Swarms now orbit around you and reduce an equipped Eagle Skill's cooldown by 0.25 seconds per hit.

description: Claw is now a Storm Skill and Casts Storm Strike. Claw and Storm Strike deal 300%% increased damage.

name: S10 1HShield Unique Necro 100
description: Lucky Hit: While you have an active Bone Storm, hitting an enemy has up to a 54%% chance to spawn a Bone Storm around their location. Each Sacrifice bonus increases this chance by 25%% and allows you to spawn 1 additional Bone Storm. Each active Bone Storm grants 20%%[x] Critical Strike Damage, up to 100%%[x]. .

name: S10 Ring Unique Druid 102
description: While Cataclysm is active, you gain unlimited Spirit and deal 48%%[x] increased damage.Cataclysm receives your Lightning Bolt benefits.

name: S10 Ring Unique Necro 100
description: Every 6th attack from each Minion is empowered, exploding for 1,620 Physical damage.

name: Gloves Unique Paladin 001
description: Skills that inflict Crowd Control repeat their damage as Lightning. This Lightning's damage is increased by [100 - 125]%%[x] per second of Crowd Control inflicted.

name: S10 Pants Unique Druid 002
description: Ravens deal 120.0%%[x] increased damage and Shapeshifting into a different form or activating a Companion Skill Summons a Raven that attacks nearby enemies. Summoning a Raven has a chance to call forth an Unkindness for 10 seconds, increasing the number of Ravens Summoned to 3 for the duration.

name: S10 Ring Unique Sorc 102
description: Lightning damage leaves enemies magnetized for 4 seconds causing them to emit Crackling Energy, and increasing all Lightning damage they take from you by 72.0%%[x]. If two magnetized enemies hit each other with Crackling Energy they pull each other together.

name: Hesha e Kesungi
description: The Protector can be invoked at range and Pulls inward with its smashes. Enemies in its area take 60%%[x] increased damage from your Gorilla Skills, doubled while they are Knocked Down or a Boss.

name: S10 Chest Unique Necro 100
description: You are Blood Lanced, and when Blood Lance would deal damage to you, it instead Fortifies you for 4.8%% of your Maximum Life and has a 10%% chance to form a Blood Orb.Blood Lance deals 48%%[x] increased damage.

name: Boots Unique Spiritborn 001
description: Every [12.0 - 4.0] meters you move, invoke a base Core Skill from your primary Spirit Hall.

name: Pants Unique Rogue 100
description: Dance of Knives drops knives from enemies hit. Picking them up grants you 1 Charge and increases your Dance of Knives damage by [10.0 - 20.0]%%[x] for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

name: 1HMace Unique Sorc 100
description: For each Defensive Skill not on your Action Bar, you deal [20.0 - 40.0]%%[x] increased damage and gain its associated Enchantment effect.

name: Boots Unique Druid 101
description: Damaging [150 - 100] Enemies with Nature Magic Skills grants Max Movement Speed and Unhindered for [4 - 8] seconds. While active, enemies you run into are Immobilized for 1 second.

name: Pants Unique Barb 101
description: Casting a damaging Brawling Skill disables it afterwards. When all of these Skills that are on your Action Bar are disabled, they become re-enabled with their Cooldowns refreshed. Brawling Skills you Cast deal [50.0 - 100.0]%%[x] increased damage for each disabled Skill.

name: Ring Unique Paladin 002
description: Judgement deals [150 - 250]%%[x] increased damage.Judgement has a 33%% chance to explode twice.

name: Boots Unique Paladin 001
description: Advance deals [100 - 140]%%[x] increased damage, gains 3 Skill Ranks, and travels twice as far.

name: 2HSword Unique Paladin 002
description: Zeal deals [120 - 180]%%[x] increased damage and gains the Death or Glory Upgrade for free.

name: 2HAxe Unique Paladin 001
description: Casting an Aura Skill triggers a Consecration beneath you. You gain [90 - 180]%% Aura Potency while standing in Consecration.

name: Equip a power using conditional dependency tech.
description: Equip a power using conditional dependency tech.

name: Pants Unique Paladin 001
description: Holy Bolt conjures a Blessed Hammer when it hits an enemy.

name: 1HFlail Unique Paladin 002
description: Falling Star deals [50 - 100]%%[x] increased damage.Killing an enemy with Falling Star resets its Cooldown and increases its damage by 10%%[x] for 6 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. This effect can only happen once per cast.

name: 1HFlail Unique Paladin 003
description: Enemies impaled by the first strike of Divine Lance take [180 - 250]%% increased damage from Divine Lance's subsequent hits.

name: 1HShield Unique Paladin 005
description: Lucky Hit: Casted Disciple Skills have up to a [5 - 10]%% chance to call down Spear of the Heavens on a random enemy. Your Spear of the Heavens damage is increased by [60 - 100]%%[x].

name: 1HSword Unique Paladin 002
description: Dealing direct damage grants [1.0 - 2.0]%%[x] increased Critical Strike Damage for each enemy hit within 10 seconds, up to [50 - 100]%%[x].At Maximum you gain:Lucky Hit: Critical Strikes have up to a 50%% chance to deal double damage, Heal for [50 - 150] Life, and refresh the duration of the bonus.

name: Pants Unique Paladin 002
description: Rally Fortifies you for [4.0 - 8.0]%% of your Maximum Life. Whenever you recover 8%% of your Maximum Life, gain a charge of Rally.

name: yhuo PreloadPerfTest Affix Bad
description: Equip a power WITHOUT using conditional dependency tech.

name: 1HMace Unique Paladin 001
description: Blessed Hammer deals [110 - 150]%%[x] increased damage.Lucky Hit: Up to a 20%% chance to spawn a base Blessed Hammer on the target hit.

name: 1HFlail Unique Paladin 001
description: Blessed Shield no longer costs Faith and is additionally a Basic Skill. Blessed Shield deals [20 - 25]%%[x] increased damage.

name: 2HSword Unique Paladin 001
description: Each enemy hit by Falling Star increases your attack speed by 5%% and Zealot Skill damage by [12.00 - 15.00]%%[x] for 4 seconds. Stacks up to 10 times.

name: 1HShield Unique Paladin 001
description: Juggernaut Core Skills are empowered, dealing [60 - 100]%%[x] increased damage to the first enemy hit and storing the damage dealt to that target, up to 10 times. Fortress unleashes this stored damage to all enemies within its area.

name: 1HShield Unique Paladin 002
description: Blocking has a 15%% chance to retaliate with a Shield Bash. Your Shield Bash damage is increased by [60 - 100]%%[x].

name: 1HShield Unique Paladin 003
description: Blessed Shield deals [77 - 177]%%[x] increased damage. Casting another Skill makes your next 3 Blessed Shields double this bonus and cost 7 less Faith to Cast.

name: Gloves Unique Paladin 002
description: Killing a Crowd Controlled enemy triggers a Holy Nova dealing 900 Holy damage to surrounding enemies.You deal [30 - 50]%%[x] increased damage to Unstoppable enemies.

name: 1HFlail Unique Paladin 004
description: Heaven's Fury gains 3 additional rays and deals [30 - 50]%% increased damage.
